entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 03:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: SSE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
